title: Bug 27258[Linked Resources] Should display variable name in NewFolderDialog and new file/folder wizards
description: build 20021119The link target location field in the NewFolderDialog and in the newfile/folder wizards should display the variable name when a variable is chooseninstead of a file/folder name.A label below the text field should show the resolved path.Also, it should be possible to enter variable names directly in the text fieldand have them resolve automatically.See the Edit/Attach Source dialogs in the Java build properties.
